title: Star Guardian Icon
body: I've seen some people on the forums with a star guardian icon (a new one, not from the last set). Where do we get it? I can't find anything on the Universe landing page.

replies.body: Hard to know which icon you're talking about without a picture. I might it if I'm able to see it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LtbwOK6m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-07T00:39:47.458+0000)
>
> Hard to know which icon you're talking about without a picture. I might it if I'm able to see it!

It was one of the ones with a star, but it didn't have a rainbow background like the first set had.
